name: Helpdesk Florida
description:
A 64x64 lowrez tribute to Hotline Miami

Controls

Click to lock mouse. Move with cursor keys, aim with mouse,

Left click = Shoot

Right click = Change weapon (Available weapon at current position shown in top right corner)

Ammo count in top left corner

Tested on latest Chrome and Firefox

Source

https://github.com/mneubrand/helpdesk-florida (warning: undocumented mess)

Sounds

Background music: http://www.playonloop.com/2012-music-loops/funk-ma....

Shotgun: http://freesound.org/people/Marregheriti/sounds/26....

Bullet hitting wall: http://freesound.org/people/toxicwafflezz/sounds/1....

Empty gun: http://freesound.org/people/knova/sounds/170272/

Death splash: http://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/23....

Punch: https://www.freesound.org/people/FolderPax/sounds/....

Assault Rifle: http://freesound.org/people/tehlordoswag420/sounds....
